website_summaries.verdict: Small in stature, however produces mighty results.
pros: Gentle microfiber pads buff away surface level dust and debris
Designed for easy care and maintenance of cars that don't have deep scratches or other surface abrasions
Small enough to pack in pockets and glove compartment and take with
cons: Doesn't provide the deep cleanse that a motorized buffer would

customer_reviews.title: great size for horse tack cleaning and conditioning
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pads to apply conditioner to my saddle and other tack and they work well. A bit stiff at first, but they limber up with some use. I had to find something inexpensive, because they do get filthy and you can't wash the condition out--and, because they're small enough to fit into the cleaning pouch I received with my saddle. They are soft and don't scratch my saddle--which is easily the most expensive leather object I own. They are small enough to wrap around reins and other small pieces of leather for conditioning. I'll buy more when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Landry

customer_reviews.title: Not the highest quality microfiber, but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I use these applicator pads in my home to clean the dust off of and wax my wood furniture. I also use them on the interior of my car when applying dressing. These pads are not of the highest quality microfiber, but they get the job done for my needs. I actually have never tried washing one so I cant comment on how they fair after washing. I usually just use them a couple times until they are to dirty to use again and throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah StephensTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Expected better.
customer_reviews.text: Eh... very wafer thin. There's a two pack I bought from Walmart that I like better. Chincy and thin. Don't care much for these. Literally at all. The microfiber feels cheap and is barely there and will not hold hardly ANY product
customer_reviews.author: B-Dix

customer_reviews.title: Viking 862400 BLue Microfiber Wax Applicatore
customer_reviews.text: These pads are great for applying paste wax when you are polishing your car. While I suspect they'd be equally as useful with a liquid polish, I don't use a liquid polish on my vehicles so you're on your own as far as that's concerned. The nice thing is that they are soft, so as not to scratch the paint finish, and they are generally re-usable if you wash them in soap and water immediately after your waxing is completed. Great product for car care and probably any other smooth finish.
customer_reviews.author: Craig in Florida

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: horribly rough and flat. nothing to grab on to. threw them away. don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect applicatior pads
customer_reviews.text: Excellent applicator pads. I think the pads will be perfect for polishing and waxing. Do not expect these to work a mirical on an abused finish. I belive some of the negative feedback is due to user not preparing the paint, clay bar, compounding, polishing , sealer, waving.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I don't think you can do better. I purchased these microfiber pads to apply wax to my vehicle and shine products to my tires. For both applications these pads performed as expected, and held up very well. They are soft and adequately thick. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them to others or buy more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Polk

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...and more
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, also, I should add that I use these for multiple purposes...one, is as a hand rest while using my computer mouse...it works better than the 'specialty" rests. Also, can be used for cleaning glass top stoves with solvent...and, on and on. And, in case you wonder, I do not work for the company...just like the product.
customer_reviews.author: TD Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Great applicators
customer_reviews.text: I do like these and use them often as a reasonably long term user, then I throw them away when they get too soaked or worn. If you want to use them for interior care (like using vinyl or leather protectant on the interior), I recommend using an air compressor or really shaking them good, and/or rubbing them with two other microfibres to get any lint off of them before you wipe your interior. Once they're worn in they do a nice job.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Application is much easier and is probably better for the car's paint
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've used these, I can't believe I used cotton rags for applying car wax. Application is much easier and is probably better for the car's paint. I'm expecting them to last a long time. Using water and liquid soap in the sink cleans it fairly well and it held up after a run through the washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: milmascaras

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: There working great, I use them for the inside and outside of my car. I use them on my leather interior and it shines them up nicely. I also use them with a little wax on the outside to shine up key parts of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mathers

customer_reviews.title: Quality control!!
customer_reviews.text: I was using these pads on a customers car adding coating and noticed very deep scratches. I knew they weren’t there before because the car is brand new and we just finished a paint correction on the entire car the day before. So I inspect my microfiber towels (brand new) and find nothing. I look at this pad (also brand new) and feel something sharp prick my finger. I end up digging a damn staple out of the pad!! Now the car will need the driver side door repainted. If I had known was I was going be pulling out of the pad I would have made a video.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding applicator at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Viking Car Care Microfiber Applicator Pads is a quality product at a very reasonable price. The package contains six pads which is more than I needed, but the package will last me for years (so far I've only used one). The pads are well constructed, soft and sufficiently large to fit comfortably in your hand. This is a professional applicator and performs beautifully, and youcan't beat the price. I believe you will be as happy as I am. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: SkyKingCFI

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it's made for!
customer_reviews.text: I watched a YouTube video of a guy using this product to compound and wax his car and gave it a try too. I don't want to rate the "Absorption" too high, since, it's used to APPLY and not be used as a paper towel or something haha. Great product! I compounded and waxed my dirty 23-year-old car with this with no problem, and it came out amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mosberger

customer_reviews.title: Started to fall apart before finishing waxing one car
customer_reviews.text: It is soft and does the job but the pad started to fall apart before I even finished waxing and buffing one car. I guess its good for one time use. Wished it was a little more durable.
customer_reviews.author: jhuang15

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: I am so very very happy I found these, a sponge and microfiber cloth combined, some in so handy for many cleaning jobs. A very nice size as well, big enough to get many types of jobs done, but not so big they are cumbersome. I use them everywhere, the kitchen, bathroom shower/tub, our cars interior and exterior(excellent for Armorall application), and in the garage for tough projects.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Not good for wax on rustic wood application
customer_reviews.text: The intended purpose for my purchase was to use to apply carnuba wax to my rustic barn doors. They did not work at all for this purpose. I’m sure I will find other little jobs they can do around the house but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Many uses for these
customer_reviews.text: I used these applicator pads to apply a dye stain to a piece of curly maple. They held up well, no complaints. I’ll also use these to wax the car and probably a million other uses. Makes sense to buy these in bulk since they’re so versatile, but they also seem to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Snell

customer_reviews.title: God loves you
customer_reviews.text: These were great for cleaning and polishing some things that have been put away years ago. They clean up pretty easily too with soap and water. Soft, but put together right. Does not fall apart,so I was able to get a lot of use out of just one. Next I'll try them out in the bathroom. Thanks for getting them delivered so fast.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Delivered very dirty! Beware
customer_reviews.text: These “lint free” pads came full of dirt/leaves. The dirt was underneath the plastic wrap indicating the factory is not a very clean environment. You’re definitely going to want to wash these before using them on your car. I’m glad I saw these pieces of dirt before scratching my paint.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great applicator pad
customer_reviews.text: Great applicator pad, I've never attempted cleaning these I usually toss them when they get too dirty. These work great on applying tire dressing, wax or any paint protector on your car, much less expensive than purchasing these at Autozone. Best value buying them here.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Angel

customer_reviews.title: Mini polishers for my car
customer_reviews.text: This pads seem to work well for the stated task. I use them to wax and polish the finish for my car. The wax and the pads are great in tandem to make the finish shine. Only reason I gave the product four stars...haven’t washed them, don’t even know if they are washable. Hope so, otherwise, great product!
customer_reviews.author: David S Patch

customer_reviews.title: I use for tire dressing.
customer_reviews.text: I know these are suppose to be used to apply wax but I use them on my tires, I got tired of those foam dressing applicators tearing and I had to replace them. With these cloth surface they last a long time. I own four cars they save me a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Wooten

customer_reviews.title: These work great and rinse out very easily.
customer_reviews.text: These work great and rinse out very easily. I will definitely purchase these again. Coming from a person who cleans my motorcycle weekly. Fresh wax every Saturday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good applicators for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of detailing on our family's vehicles because i enjoy it. I just finished the first package of these after a year of regular use and abuse and just finishing polishing our new motorhome. I have just placed another package in my cart for purchase and can strongly recommend these for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jumping Jack Flash

customer_reviews.title: Already tore coming out of box.
customer_reviews.text: Right after unboxing them, I noticed one of the six applicator pads had a rip at the seam line. I understand that they are cheap and not of the best quality material, but it would be nice to have them in perfect condition right after you buy them. Other than that, it seems like it will get the job done of waxing a car a couple times. Good beginners applicator pad, would look into a higher quality if looking for a pad that you can wash and reuse over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Treyton Farnan

customer_reviews.title: You can toss the old dirty wax pads and wax your car effectively
customer_reviews.text: This started as a purchase to fill my order knowing that I was going to be able to have a clean pad when I needed one But it’s now a item I keep in stock enabling me to wax faster and efficient
customer_reviews.author: carl h.

customer_reviews.title: Work great!  And good value too
customer_reviews.text: These are well made applicators. You may want to wash them before use to ensure no linting on your application. Good value too.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not Only For Cars 🚗
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these for polishing his car. They work great! I have also used them to clean my tile floor in the kitchen and to polish the chrome in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Microfiber pads
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot easier to use that plain microfiber towels. I wash them with liquid soap and dry them on low heat.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Laird

customer_reviews.title: I love these, they work great for applying cleaner and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they work great for applying cleaner and wax on my 1906 Singer Treadle sewing machine as well as all three of my Singer Featherweights and my Bernina. I have only used for cleaning and waxing my sewing machines and the microfiber really does a great job of getting the machines shining like glass. I am so glad I found these.
customer_reviews.author: SheriO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement to expensive kitchen sponges!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use as kitchen sponges since the other microfiber ones I like are so expensive. These work perfectly! perfect size for doing the dishes, wiping counters, and at roughly $1 a piece they are unbeatable price wise. I use one for a couple days, then toss it in the wash with my clothes, and rotate them around.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Knott

customer_reviews.title: Best used on tires and dash boards
customer_reviews.text: Just spray some tire dressings on them and apply on tires, prevents overspray. Just spray some dashoard dressings on them and apply on interior trims, no overspray. They are small so easy to work with on small areas.
customer_reviews.author: LEONG

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Works well. Machine washable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and well made. Machine washable a plus! Used mostly for leather conditioner and interior cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: klw

customer_reviews.title: These are great. For a buck a piece
customer_reviews.text: These are great. For a buck a piece, what can you say, but a good buy. Other major brands cost up to 7 times as much, but they are the same. Don't get me wrong, I like using the major brands a much as the next user, but for a buck, you can't beat the price. I am thinking of buying more in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: WVL

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: These did the trick for applying polishing compound to my guitar build, I also used them to apply the wax.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: made well
customer_reviews.text: wont' scratch car, and yet made so well the clean efficiently. I even use them to buff car with wax
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: I'm Cock of the Walk with these microfiber disks
customer_reviews.text: Anyone can pull out a microfiber cloth, but watch heads turn when you show up with a stack of microfiber disks! Featuring firm squishy sponge cores, these disks hold shape and won't let you down. They're exactly what you hope they are.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.J.

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for everything from dish washing and cleaning up with vinegar or other natural cleaners, to use as an applicator of natural waxes and other things like food safe wood conditioners for wooden salad bowls and cutting board conditioning etc. After months of everyday use these are holding up great! Other products fall apart in bits you have to clear from the sink drain etc. If you want lasting quality in a sponge cloth, these are the ones to buy!
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for interior protectant and they work great for the purpose. Cheap enough to scrap at some point but I expect that they would last through many uses.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Nice applicator pads
customer_reviews.text: These microfiber applicator pads are just right for application of my car paint protection products.
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and provides a nice even look to soapstone counters!
customer_reviews.text: These work really well for applying Van's counter top beeswax to my soapstone kitchen counters. I'm sure they would be good for other products too. Way better than a piece of cloth, old sock or paper towel. Wax stays on a bit after applying as well so the pad can be used for touch up in between applications. Haven't attempted to launder pads yet.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and work
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to say other then for the money they are soft, work great and I use them daily at work and the first one has already lasted 2 weeks of loads of cars. I'd highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Saiger

customer_reviews.title: Wax on wax off
customer_reviews.text: These would be easier to hold if they were an inch larger. I waxed my F150 crew & my honey's new Vette. I used 2 pads on each with no problems. They clean up well & are well worth the $$$...
customer_reviews.author: todd walters

customer_reviews.title: Great way to apply polish or wax, much better than old rags or towels.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable size to use with my hand. With a few of these, I can use only one dedicated to a single product and simply insert into a ziplock bag for future use of same product.
customer_reviews.author: RON

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These pads are not soft like you would expect for microfiber. The nap was short and tends to clog easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ridin Red

customer_reviews.title: These little things are great, they do a great job in aiding you ...
customer_reviews.text: These little things are great, they do a great job in aiding you when you spread wax, bug remover or any product when attending to your vehicle. They absorb your liquids and stay moist for a long time, and as we all know it is better to spray your product on a pad like this than it is to spray the vehicle and risk spraying areas you've completed.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality of microfiber I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: While these are adequate pads for applying waxes and polishes, I was expecting some better quality microfiber material. They're still usable, but I suspect that they will have a shorter life than I would expect for the product.
customer_reviews.author: NathanK98

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitchen duty.
customer_reviews.text: I use these instead of regular sponges in the kitchen. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: funWithWords

customer_reviews.title: Excellent microfiber pads
customer_reviews.text: Excellent microfiber pads. I not only wax my car with them, I attached them to my drill and they also double as a device to clean off my friends headlights that were hazed over. Item was just as described by the Seller + fast shipping. Seller's Grade: A+
customer_reviews.author: Hapkido Master

customer_reviews.title: Great product,
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for years, they are great product last for a long time making worth the price and r excellent for sealing and waxing a car.
customer_reviews.author: Arne

customer_reviews.title: Great value-Nice to have extras on hand
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. These do a great job of applying waxes without causing scratches to the car finish. This is a good price for this many of these. It's good to replace them when they become worn/saturated or start to lose their structure..
customer_reviews.author: Stan57Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Works good for applying compound & polish on my car to buff out paint
customer_reviews.author: John Wylie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in the Kitchen too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in the kitchen. They're perfect for washing dishes because they hold the right amount of soap and water to get the job done and they're so durable.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Bee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pads.
customer_reviews.text: Used one to wax a van and a car. Held up really well. Nice to have spares.
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: This will be used this weekend to detail the hull ...
customer_reviews.text: This will be used this weekend to detail the hull of my boat. For the price of these applicators, really hard to beat. Very very reasonable, actually I should have bought the ten pack, but since these can be washed and reused, six is more than sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: Good pads at a good cost
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pack of these for my car care kit. They work well and are soft and plush. I have reused several of them with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not super impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I've used one so far. Within a couple of minutes, it started to put small pieces of the pad onto the area I was working on. (I was waxing my car). Didn't really care for that.
customer_reviews.author: PCaron

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Did their jobs, not the easiest to clean, suggested to put in washer, but with car wax on them I was reluctant. Hand washed instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Pads
customer_reviews.text: used 3 of them so far and these are good quality , highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: irfan

customer_reviews.title: They're cheap and they work
customer_reviews.text: I mean, they work as well as you'd expect, I guess. Not much to go wrong here. I've waxed my car with them a few times and they haven't fallen apart, so I guess that's a win. Way cheaper than a 2-pack at the auto parts stores, so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mooney

customer_reviews.title: still trying to decide if I like these better than the foam ones
customer_reviews.text: still trying to decide if I like these better than the foam ones, only negative i can think of is that these will pick up and hold onto dirt/debris just like a microfiber towel, so be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Negative_Milk

customer_reviews.title: Great Microfiber Discs for Car Detailing
customer_reviews.text: These work very well and considering the price I got several packs of these. I get three or so uses (depending on the solution I'm using) out of each side of each disc before having to discard. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: FutureNow

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Typical, not recomend on attaching them to anything that spins. Lol But they do work. Typical for anything to come apart when attached to buffers or drills. They lasted for a while though.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: They are not soft but somewhat useful
customer_reviews.text: They are ok. I wouldn’t use this on my paint because is too rough and would end up scratching it or add swirls marks. Ended up using them to apply tire dressing.
customer_reviews.author: marco cabrera jr

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality item. I use them along with gifts of hand-made cheese boards. They are much easier to use than standard microfiber towels.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Not that functional
customer_reviews.text: A decent enough product but I would just use a basic microfiber cloth instead of buying this.
customer_reviews.author: John Osgood

customer_reviews.title: Great for wet sanding!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these so far for my washing and wet-sanding on my car. I'm sure they'll be great for buffing later too.
customer_reviews.author: Amz.Verified

customer_reviews.title: Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were easier to hold while applying wax or polish, but otherwise it was s great deal and does there job
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great pads. Pretty soft, but easy to hold on to while applying wax.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E

customer_reviews.title: Vehicle Shines Like New
customer_reviews.text: After using these applicators with the liquid wax we purchased, the RAV 4 looks brand new! Very happy with these applicators and will get them again when these are used up.
customer_reviews.author: Live Wire

customer_reviews.title: It's a pad
customer_reviews.text: What can you say. It's a microfiber pad and I use it to polish my car. It's like any other microfiber pad so I guess there's nothing more to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Nut

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I actually only needed two of these. The six pack was cheaper than everyone else’s two packs. Good deal for a great product
customer_reviews.author: suroos2011

customer_reviews.title: Kudos
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pad. It os easy to hold and clean. It works well and it is durable. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Joey T.

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Japan is a sponge, but the United States uses microfiber so it is easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: Nobuhiro Nishida

customer_reviews.title: Pad-App Mini
customer_reviews.text: Just consider that these will probably be throways after a use or two because they dirty up fast and can't easily be washed, etc. Kinda small, making them harder to grasp and use. Still, better than using a rag, and price isn't too outrageous, esp. with Prime. Hope this helped you decide.
customer_reviews.author: A Dogged shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Microfiber pads for an orbital. I'd keep them down below max speed if the velcro on your polisher is getting a little aged.
customer_reviews.author: Uriel

customer_reviews.title: These are great for wiping the car's interior (dash
customer_reviews.text: These are great for wiping the car's interior (dash, doors, etc...) using interior detailing products. I did try using one for appyling wax to the exterior, but I found the 'foam' pads really are best for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Blazin Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good product but careful.
customer_reviews.text: They were sealed in a plastic film but it came like this.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: good for cleaning up cars. i use to polish chrome or to polish up some of the plastic plastic on my car
customer_reviews.author: C Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea for applying waxes and sealers to any surface you would normally use on these surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: Great Idea for applying paste, liquid and other things to various surfaces. Microfiber is much softer than the common terry cloth applicator. I would think a 6-pack of these would last a very long time, given they are fully washable. I like the idea of a 6-pack so I can share them with others.
customer_reviews.author: Paul 1946

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality I use it for tight spots when waxing and it great for cleaning and conditioning the seats and the dash.
customer_reviews.author: Chris E.

customer_reviews.title: Strong - holds up well!
customer_reviews.text: Strong, works nicely! Used these to apply wax and tire gel (separate applicators). Worked well for both and pad held up - microfiber cover stayed on, even with rubbing on tires. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: GF4Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cleaning Silver
customer_reviews.text: These work really well to clean off a heavily tarnished silver piece. They are really durable so they can be reused for a while before needing to replace.
customer_reviews.author: ELM

customer_reviews.title: Best shower sponge ever!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon will tell you that this is a car care application pad, but don’t believe it. This is THE BEST SHOWER SPONGE EVER! Really, no kidding. Just try it in a shower, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Y.

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: Good price, work great, have washed them out to use again still soft
customer_reviews.author: Paul Homer

customer_reviews.title: Work great. No marring whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: Work great. No marring whatsoever. I've used them with polishes and waxes without any issues. Definitely will purchase again when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Sheds Blue Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Should have read the reviews first as several people report the same. I purchased applicators to **avoid** using something (like a rag) that could shed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Daley III

customer_reviews.title: Good applicators.
customer_reviews.text: Used for hand polishing, and waxing the car. Works well!
customer_reviews.author: Cat dad

customer_reviews.title: I really feel that it did a nice job on our 2017 Nissan Pathfinder Black-on-Black Midnight Edition
customer_reviews.text: Notwithstanding some of the other comments, I really feel that it did a nice job on our 2017 Nissan Pathfinder Black-on-Black Midnight Edition...
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Kieffer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning seats
customer_reviews.text: These pads work really well to apply seat cleaner. I have not yet tried them with car polish or wax but I"m optimistic they will work great. They work a hundred times better than towels or paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Fred E. Callison

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Got around to using one the other day on the RV. Worked as well if not better than the higher priced ones I bought from a big bow store. Will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: CEW

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product and these are the ones you should order. FAST SHIPPING, Great Price
customer_reviews.author: RANDAWG 666

customer_reviews.title: Wax on, Wax off
customer_reviews.text: Decided to stop ruining my wife's dish towels. These applicators are easy to use and make applying wax easy. I anticipate getting many uses out of each one.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Came with a rip in 2 out of six pads. I'd say these are junk.

customer_reviews.title: Apply car finishes
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for wax, absorbed some as with tire dressing & interior cleaning
customer_reviews.author: YNOT

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Used these to apply Griot's leather care to my car's seats. I only used one and it worked good and washed up like new afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nil

customer_reviews.title: I used one pad and used it in washer/dryer and it still looked good. I will buy them again
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a pro, so, these are bang for my buck. I used one pad and used it in washer/dryer and it still looked good. I will buy them again, if I ever need them.

customer_reviews.text: Upon first use, the stitching came out on the exterior of the pad.

product_meta.title: VIKING 862401 Microfiber Applicator and Cleaning Pads - 5 Inch Diameter, Blue, 6 Pack
product_meta.description: The Viking microfiber applicator pads promote an even application of polishes, glazes, waxes and protectants. For optimal results, use a fresh applicator pad for different tasks. It has two microfiber applicators per pack. It soft, high-tech microfiber promotes even application. It provides a clear coat safe.
feature_bullets: Evenly distributes waxes, polish, protectants, and dressings
